Jahnavi

About Me

I am B.Jahnavi, an electronics student with a solid foundation in analog and digital electronics, microprocessors, and circuit design. Currently, I am pursuing my final year in RGMCET. I have gained hands-on experience through academic projects, which have sharpened my technical skills and problem-solving abilities. I am eager to apply my knowledge in a dynamic environment, collaborate with industry professionals, and contribute to innovative technological solutions. Passionate about continuous learning, I am excited to embark on my journey as an electronics engineer.

Projects

Project One

Contributed to a community service project focused on Village Awareness, where I applied my electronics skills to improving local education in underpriviledged schools. This experience enhanced my teamwork and problem-solving abilities while positively impacting the community.

Project Two

Designed a low noise amplifier using Cadence tools to enhance signal quality in RF applications, focusing on minimizing noise figure and optimizing gain. Achieved robust performance with precision circuit layout and simulation.
